title: The Journey
overview: E Yin spent his childhood in the house of a mysterious mentor, learning magic. Using his strength, she travels through time helping people and unraveling karmic ties. They say that life is the germ, the seeds of which are laid down in a previous incarnation, and karma cannot be changed. But you can find the root of the problem and try to fix the past. Can E Yin to prevent the inevitable? Will she be able to find his lost love?
